library(shiny)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet) 


shinyServer(function(input, output) {
  
  # Stations
  d.stations <- data.frame(Latitude = c(46.94809, 47.05048, 47.69732), 
                           Longitude = c(7.44744, 8.30635, 8.63493), 
                           Label = c("Bern", "Luzern", "Schaffhausen"))

  # leaflet map  
  output$simpleMap <- renderLeaflet({
    
    leaflet(d.stations) %>%
      addTiles() %>%
      addCircles(lng = ~Longitude, lat = ~Latitude)
    
    # leaflet(d.stations) %>%

    #              ## argument label: a character vector of the HTML content
    #              ## for the labels

    # leaflet(d.stations) %>%

    #              ## argument label: a character vector of the HTML content
    #              ## for the labels

})
